title: Solar System and Space Exploration

vocab.definition: The sun and all the objects that orbit around it
A large object that orbits the sun and has cleared its orbital path
A small rocky object that orbits the sun
A ball of ice and rock that develops a tail when it comes near the sun
Any object that orbits another object in space

teachingNotes: Use scale models to show relative sizes and distances. Discuss recent space missions and discoveries. Compare terrestrial and gas giant planets.
